sen.j: 酒盗（しゅとう）とは、カツオの内臓を原料とする塩辛である。
sen.e: Shuto is salted fish guts of a skipjack tuna, a bonito.
Shuto is salted fish guts of a skipjack tuna, a bonito.
Shuto is salted fish guts of a skipjack tuna, a bonito.

sen.j: 土佐国（高知県）名物のひとつ。
sen.e: It is one of local foods in the Tosa Province.
It is one of local foods in the Tosa Province (Kochi Prefecture).
It is one of local foods in the Tosa Province (Kochi Prefecture).

sen.j: 正徳 (日本)2年（1712年）頃の出版とされる百科事典、和漢三才図会にすでに酒盗という名称がみられる。
sen.e: The name, Shuto, already appeared in an encyclopedia, "Wakan-sansai-zue" (an encyclopedia compiled in the Edo period) that is said to be published in around the Shotoku era (Japan), 1712.
The name, Shuto, already appeared in the encyclopedia, "Wakan-sansai-zue" (an encyclopedia compiled in the Edo period) that is said to be published in around 1712.
sen.cmt: an→the と修正し、和暦である”正徳”は削除しました。ピリオドの位置を修正しました。
sen.e: The name, Shuto, already appeared in the encyclopedia, "Wakan-sansai-zue" (an encyclopedia compiled in the Edo period) that is said to be published in around 1712.

sen.j: これを肴に飲むと酒がすすんでしまい、「盗まれるように酒がなくなっていく」あるいは「酒が無くなったら盗んででも飲みたくなる」からとも云われている。
sen.e: It is said that, if you drink sake while eating Shuto as sakana (appetizers taken with alcoholic drinks), you run short of sake soon "as if it is stolen by someone" or "you want to drink it even if you steal it from someone."

It is said that, if you drink sake while eating Shuto as sakana (appetizers taken with alcoholic drinks), you run short of sake soon 'as if it is stolen by someone' or 'you want to drink it even if you steal it from someone.'
sen.cmt: クォーツを修正しました。
sen.e: It is said that, if you drink sake while eating Shuto as sakana (appetizers taken with alcoholic drinks), you run short of sake soon 'as if it is stolen by someone' or 'you want to drink it even if you steal it from someone.'

sen.j: 一説には土佐の第12代藩主、山内豊資（とよすけ）が土佐清水でこれを振舞われた際に名づけたという伝承があるが、豊資は1794年生まれである為信憑性に乏しい。
sen.e: One theory is that its history started when the 12th lord of the Tosa domain, Toyosuke YAMAUCHI, was served this appetizer in Tosashimizu and he named it Shuto, but this story lacks credibility as Toyosuke was born in 1794.

One theory is that its history started when the 12th lord of the Tosa Domain, Toyosuke YAMAUCHI, was served this appetizer in Tosashimizu and he named it Shuto, but this story lacks credibility as Toyosuke was born in 1794.

One theory is that its history started when the 12th lord of the Tosa Domain, Toyosuke YAMAUCHI, was served this appetizer in Tosashimizu and he named it Shuto, but this story lacks credibility as Toyosuke was born in 1794.

sen.j: 鰹の胃と腸をよく洗い、辛口では20%、甘口のものでは10%程度の塩で漬け込む。
sen.e: When you make Shuto, clean bonito's stomach and intestines with water and salt down in 20 % salt-water solution for dry one and 10 % salt-water solution for mild one.
When you make Shuto, clean thoroughly bonito's stomach and intestines with water, and salt down in 20 % salt-water solution for salty one and 10 % salt-water solution for mild one.
sen.cmt: clean thoroughly として補強しました。 カンマを挿入しました。この場合の”辛口”は”塩辛い”として修正しました。
sen.e: When you make Shuto, clean thoroughly bonito's stomach and intestines with water, and salt down in 20 % salt-water solution for salty one and 10 % salt-water solution for mild one.

sen.j: メーカーにより酒、みりん、蜂蜜などで調味し、最低でも半年から一年熟成させた後に出荷される。
sen.e: Shuto processors ship it after seasoning it with sake, sakemirin (sweet cooking rice wine), and honey and maturing it for at least half a year to one year.
Shuto makers ship it, after seasoning it with sake, sakemirin (sweet cooking rice wine), and honey and maturing it for at least half a year to one year.
sen.cmt: processors→makers,カンマを挿入しました。
sen.e: Shuto makers ship it, after seasoning it with sake, sakemirin (sweet cooking rice wine), and honey and maturing it for at least half a year to one year.

sen.j: 内臓に含まれる消化酵素によって熟成し、よく熟れたものは茶漬けにするととろける程になる。
sen.e: It matures by digestive enzyme contained in guts, and well-matured Shuto is meltingly delicious when it is eaten with rice with tea poured on.
It matures by digestive enzyme contained in guts, and well-matured Shuto almost melts when it is eaten with rice with tea poured on.
sen.cmt: meltingly delicious→almost melts と修正しました。
sen.e: It matures by digestive enzyme contained in guts, and well-matured Shuto almost melts when it is eaten with rice with tea poured on.

sen.j: 飯にももちろん良く合うが、やはり酒の肴として絶好である。
sen.e: Of course, it is good for rice, but after all, it is the best appetizer when you drink sake.
Of course, it is good with rice, but still, it is the best appetizer when you drink sake.
sen.cmt: for→with,after all→still と修正しました。
sen.e: Of course, it is good with rice, but still, it is the best appetizer when you drink sake.

sen.j: 鰹の内臓は4～5kgのものでも50ｇ程しか取れないため、一般家庭で作られることは殆ど無い。
sen.e: As even a four or five-kilogram weight bonito has only about 50 grams guts, so Shuto is rarely made at home.
Since a 4 to 5kg bonito has only about 50g of guts, Shuto is rarely made at home.
sen.cmt: アラビア数字で統一し、それぞれkg, g と修正しました。文脈に応じて修正しました。
sen.e: Since a 4 to 5kg bonito has only about 50g of guts, Shuto is rarely made at home.

sen.j: もともとは生利節を製造する際に大量に出る内臓を、漁師や加工業者が塩辛にして食べていたものが始まりであると言われている。
sen.e: It is believed that Shuto originally came form salted fish guts made and eaten by fishermen and processors who made it form the large amount of guts when they made namaribushi (boiled and half-dried bonito).

It is believed that Shuto originally came from salted fish guts, made and eaten by fishermen and processors who made it from the large amount of guts removed when they made namaribushi (boiled and half-dried bonito).
sen.cmt: form→from,カンマを挿入しました。スペースを修正しました。大量に”出る”内臓、という部分を補強しました。
sen.e: It is believed that Shuto originally came from salted fish guts, made and eaten by fishermen and processors who made it from the large amount of guts removed when they made namaribushi (boiled and half-dried bonito).

sen.j: そのまま酒肴とするほか、近年では酒盗を料理の調味料として使った様々な調理法が考案されている。
sen.e: Other than eaten as an accompaniment to a drink, recently various new recipes are invented by using it as a seasoning.
Other than eaten as an accompaniment to a drink, recently various new recipes are invented by using it as a seasoning.
Other than eaten as an accompaniment to a drink, recently various new recipes are invented by using it as a seasoning.

sen.j: 生で和え物などにしたり、アンチョビのように加熱してチャーハンのような炒め物、また煮物などに隠し味として使うと料理のコクが増す。
sen.e: It is used for aemono (chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with (miso or other) sauce) as it is or, like an anchovy, used for stir-fried dishes such as fried rice, or for food boiled and seasoned as it increases savory (rich) when used as a hidden flavor.

It is used for aemono (chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with [miso or other] sauce) as it is or, like anchovies, used for stir-fried dishes such as fried rice, or for food boiled and seasoned as it increases savory (rich) when used as a hidden flavor.
sen.cmt: カッコを修正しました。an anchovy→anchovies と修正しました。
sen.e: It is used for aemono (chopped fish, shellfish or vegetables, dressed with [miso or other] sauce) as it is or, like anchovies, used for stir-fried dishes such as fried rice, or for food boiled and seasoned as it increases savory (rich) when used as a hidden flavor.

sen.j: 鰹を使ったもののほか、マグロ、サケ、鯛、サンマといった別の魚で作った製品も登場している。
sen.e: Other than Shuto product that uses bonitos, other new products that use tuna, sake (Chum salmon), sea bream, or pike (fish) are now appearing in the market.
Other than Shuto product that uses bonitos, there are new products that use tuna, sake (Chum salmon), sea bream, or pike (fish) are now appearing on the market.
sen.cmt: other→there are,in→on と修正しました。
sen.e: Other than Shuto product that uses bonitos, there are new products that use tuna, sake (Chum salmon), sea bream, or pike (fish) are now appearing on the market.

sen.j: 内臓だけではなく、身も漬け込んだもの、柚子や唐辛子で風味をつけたものなども有り、数多くのメーカーが様々な商品で競い合っている。
sen.e: There are many products that use not only guts but also fish meat, or seasoned with Yuzu citron or red peppers, and many processors are competing to sell various products.
There are many products that use not only guts but also fish meat, or seasoned with Yuzu citron or red peppers, and many makers are competing to sell various products.
There are many products that use not only guts but also fish meat, or seasoned with Yuzu citron or red peppers, and many makers are competing to sell various products.
